creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
You need to put the new line in the embedded text.
Use:
<concat destfile="${anthome.dir}/DeploymentHistory.log" 
append="yes">WEB Build ${treeLabel}    deployed on    ${Machine}     at     
${DEP_DATETIME}${line.separator}</concat>
so for example:
<project default="c">
  <target name="c">
    <delete quiet="yes" file="c.out"/>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat destfile="c.out" append="yes">Hello world${line.separator}</concat>
    <concat><fileset file="c.out"/>
    </concat>
  </target>
</project>
